JVC Kenwood Holdings, Inc. (株式会社ジャパンビクターコーポレーション, Kabushiki-gaisha Japan Bikutā Kōporēshon), or JVCKENWOOD, is a Japanese holding company that resulted from the merger of Victor Company of Japan, Ltd, best known for its JVC brand name, and Kenwood Corporation.

JVC Kenwood Holdings (JVCケンウッドホールディングス株式会社, JVC Ken'uddo Hōrudingusu Kabushiki-gaisha) is a holding company created in 2008 after the merger of Victor Company of Japan, Ltd. (JVC) and Kenwood Corporation.
